TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pibutingan, title = Pibutingan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pibutingan} }

S.FORM: Pibutingan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Pibutingan a niyaro', 370 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,056 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 21% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 225 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 79% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 831 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 48%, 撒奇拉雅族10%, Bunun 2%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%, Puyuma 1%, roma 3%.

Pibotingan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Pibotingan a niyaro', 370 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,056 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 21% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 225 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 79% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 831 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 48%, 撒奇拉雅族10%, Bonon 2%, Tayal 1%, Troko 1%, Poyoma 1%, roma 3%.
